name: Graduation Day (Classyham)
description:
Graduation day is a first-person narrative game set on the day of Kiryu Coco's graduation from Hololive. Explore the office, meet the boss, and see where it all began.

This game was made by me in a little over a week. With the sole purpose of alleviating some of the heartbreak that myself and many others felt when we found out that Coco was graduating from Hololive. It serves as a permanent reminder of the impact she has had on all of us. As well as something to look back on and share our hopes for whatever the next chapter holds. 

I'd like to give thanks to MMMaellon who created the meme this game was based on. SPOILERS: https://www.reddit.com/r/Hololive/comments/nyan6m/secret_ame_coco_lore/

Thank you for checking out this game. I hope you enjoy it!
